page.title: 04Employment-Grundisburgh
page.content: 36 o/o of population is employed;50 o/o of adult population. Other 50 o/o as follows: Retired, 21 o/o; Housewives, 13 o/o; Undeclared Occupations, 16 o/o. 86 o/o in Full Time employment, those in Part Time employment mostly women. Less than 2 o/o Unemployed or on Youth Training Scheme. Occupation Distribution as follows: Public Services, 15 o/o; Commerce, 12.5 o/o; Industry, 12.5 o/o; Building, 11 o/o; Farming, 8 o/o; Electronics, 6.5 o/o; Retail Trade, 6 o/o. Other,(Media, Manufacturing, The Law, Parachute Instructor etc, 28.5 o/o. Armed Forces: Village acts as dormitory for U.S.A.F. personel and families. Industry: Associated with local trades only; some heavy industry in Ipswich, 10 kms and light industry, (Boat Building), Woodbridge, 5 kms.
